      w   i   d   t   h   :       4   0   0   p   x   ;       h   e   i   g   h   t   :       3   9   p   x   ;       o   v   e   r   f   l   o   w   :       h   i   d   d   e   n   ;   "   &gt;   i   m   g       a   l   t   =   '   B   e   a   u   t   i   f   u   l       t   h   i   n   g   s   ,       u   p   d   a   t   e   d       d   a   i   l   y   '       s   r   c   =   '   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   g   -   e   c   x   .   i   m   a   g   e   s   -   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   G   /   0   1   /   x   -   l   o   c   a   l   e   /   c   o   m   m   o   n   /   t   r   a   n   s   p   a   r   e   n   t   -   p   i   x   e   l   .   _   V   3   8   6   9   4   2   4   6   4   _   .   g   i   f   '       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   '   0   '       w   i   d   t   h   =   '   4   0   0   p   x   '       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   '   3   9   p   x   '       u   s   e   m   a   p   =   '   #   n   a   v   -   s   w   m   -   h   o   l   i   d   a   y   -   m   a   p   '       /   &gt;   /   d   i   v   &gt;   d   i   v       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   :       n   o   n   e   ;   "   &gt;   m   a   p       i   d   =   "   n   a   v   -   s   w   m   -   h   o   l   i   d   a   y   -   m   a   p   "       n   a   m   e   =   "   n   a   v   -   s   w   m   -   h   o   l   i   d   a   y   -   m   a   p   "   &gt;   a   r   e   a       s   h   a   p   e   =   "   r   e   c   t   "       c   o   o   r   d   s   =   "   1   ,   2   ,   4   0   0   ,   3   9   "       h   r   e   f       =   "   /   s   t   r   e   a   m   /   r   e   f   =   n   a   v   _   s   w   m   _   a   r   r   o   w   /   1   7   6   -   3   9   8   7   7   5   5   -   7   3   7   0   2   2   7   ?   p   f   _   r   d   _   m   =   A   T   V   P   D   K   I   K   X   0   D   E   R   &amp;p   f   _   r   d   _   s   =   n   a   v   -   s   i   t   e   w   i   d   e   -   m   s   g   &amp;p   f   _   r   d   _   r   =   0   T   A   1   Z   9   7   N   M   B   2   D   5   A   W   F   F   T   G   6   &amp;p   f   _   r   d   _   t   =   4   2   0   1   &amp;p   f   _   r   d   _   p   =   2   1   2   8   4   8   5   6   8   2   &amp;p   f   _   r   d   _   i   =   n   a   v   b   a   r   -   4   2   0   1   "       a   l   t       =   "   B   e   a   u   t   i   f   u   l       t   h   i   n   g   s   ,       u   p   d   a   t   e   d       d   a   i   l   y   "       /   &gt;
